name: Wartortle

evolution.description: Wartortle can evolve into Blastoise at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Turtle Pokémon. When tapped on its head, this Pokémon will pull it in, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: In rainy conditions, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency bonus at the end of each of its turns.
